title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 27, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 27, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP Recaps Monday's night Matchup between the Bears and Rams. Can the Bears make the playoffs as they're currently assembled? We're joined by Chargers QB Justin Herbert and Cardinals Safety Budda Baker, fresh off getting chased down by DK Metcalf. Plus, we have a play of the day based off of a position that we've never featured in the segment before.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
